casebody.data:
Neil H. Bowie v. The State. No. 23146. Delivered June 6, 1945. Appellant’s Motion for Rehearing Overruled (Without Written Opinion) June 28, 1945.

*513The opinion states the case.

Robert S. Durno, of Houston, for appellant. Ernest S. Goens, State’s Attorney, of Austin, for the State. HAWKINS, Presiding Judge.

Conviction is for embezzlement, punishment four years in the penitentiary.

The judgment is affirmed for the same reasons set out in our opinion in No. 23,142.
